name: secureflow
description: AI-powered security copilot that analyzes your code for vulnerabilities, performs threat modeling, and provides real-time security recommendations

enumDescriptions: Auto-detect provider from model selection
OpenAI (GPT models) - Requires OPENAI_API_KEY
Anthropic (Claude models) - Requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
Google (Gemini models) - Requires GOOGLE_API_KEY
xAI (Grok models) - Requires XAI_API_KEY
Ollama (Local models) - No API key required
OpenRouter (300+ models from all providers) - Requires OPENROUTER_API_KEY
secureflow.Provider.markdownDescription:
Select the AI provider. Choose **OpenRouter** to access 300+ models with a single API key.

When using OpenRouter, enter the full model ID in the Model field (e.g., `anthropic/claude-3-5-sonnet`, `deepseek/deepseek-chat`). Browse models at [openrouter.ai/models](https://openrouter.ai/models)

secureflow.AIModel.markdownDescription:
AI Model to use for security analysis.

**For standard providers:** Use model IDs like `claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929`, `gpt-4o`, `gemini-2.5-pro`.

**For OpenRouter:** Enter the full model ID (e.g., `anthropic/claude-3-5-sonnet`, `openai/gpt-4o`, `deepseek/deepseek-chat`, `meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct`). Browse all 300+ available models at [openrouter.ai/models](https://openrouter.ai/models)
enumDescriptions: OpenAI GPT-5.2 (2025) - Best model for coding and agentic tasks across industries
OpenAI GPT-5.1 (2025) - Flagship model for coding and agentic tasks with configurable reasoning effort
OpenAI GPT-5 Pro (2025) - Extended reasoning for most complex tasks
OpenAI GPT-5 (2025) - Most advanced model for coding and agentic tasks
OpenAI GPT-5 Mini (2025) - Faster, cost-efficient version
OpenAI GPT-5 Nano (2025) - Fastest, most cost-efficient version
Google Gemini 3 Pro (2025) - Most advanced multimodal AI with thinking capabilities
Google Gemini 3 Flash (2025) - Fast multimodal AI with thinking capabilities
Google Gemini 2.5 Pro (2025) - State-of-the-art thinking model
Google Gemini 2.5 Flash (2025) - Best price-performance with thinking
Anthropic Claude 4.5 Sonnet (2025) - RECOMMENDED for complex agents
Anthropic Claude 4.5 Opus (2025) - Premium model combining maximum intelligence with practical performance
Anthropic Claude 4.5 Haiku (2025) - Fastest model with near-frontier intelligence
xAI Grok 4.1 Fast (2025) - Frontier multimodal model optimized for high-performance agentic tool calling
xAI Grok 4 Fast Reasoning (2025) - Fast reasoning with 2M context
OpenRouter Qwen3 Coder (2024) - Specialized coding model via OpenRouter
OpenRouter GLM 4.7 (2024) - High-performance AI model via OpenRouter
OpenRouter MiniMax M2 (2025) - Compact high-efficiency model optimized for coding and agentic workflows
OpenRouter DeepSeek V3.2 (2025) - High computational efficiency with strong reasoning and agentic tool-use performance

secureflow.APIKey.description: API Key for the selected AI provider
secureflow.APIKey.markdownDescription:
API Key for the selected AI provider.

**Get your API key from:**
- OpenAI: [platform.openai.com/api-keys](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
- Anthropic: [console.anthropic.com/settings/keys](https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys)
- Google: [aistudio.google.com/apikey](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)
- OpenRouter: [openrouter.ai/settings/keys](https://openrouter.ai/settings/keys)

Alternatively, use environment variables: `OPENAI_API_KEY`, `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY`, `GOOGLE_API_KEY`, `XAI_API_KEY`, `OPENROUTER_API_KEY`

secureflow.analytics.enabled.description: Enable anonymous analytics to help improve the product. Only aggregated usage metrics are collected with no personal information. Restart Editor to apply this change.

secureflow.errorReporting.enabled.description: Enable anonymous error reporting to help improve the product stability. Only error information is collected with no personal data. Restart Editor to apply this change.

commands.title: SecureFlow: Analyze Selected Code for Security Issues
SecureFlow: Review Git Changes for Security Issues
SecureFlow: Profile Workspace for Security Analysis

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
